citation.article-title: Salisaeta longa gen. nov., sp. nov., a red, halophilic member of the Bacteroidetes
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Salisaeta (Sa.li.sae′ta. L. masc. n. sal, salis salt; L. fem. n. saeta a bristle; N.L. fem. n. Salisaeta a salt bristle).
Long rod-shaped bacteria, affiliated phylogenetically with the phylum Bacteroidetes.
Halophilic, requiring at least 5 % NaCl for growth.
The DNA G+C content of the type strain of the type species is 62.9 mol%.
The type species is Salisaeta longa.
